title: Aural set, Tibetan song - vocal phrase rhythm

content.question: The rhythm of the first vocal phrase of part 1 can be notated as

choices.label: Eighth, quarter, eighth. Eighth, two sixteenths, two eighths.
Eighth, quarter, eighth. Eighth note triplets, two eighths.
Dotted quarter, eighth. Eighth, two sixteenths, two eighths.
Dotted quarter, eighth. Eight note triplets, two eighths.

content.answer: Eighth, quarter, eighth. Eighth, two sixteenths, two eighths.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
